scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-server && npm run build-client-prod
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm run build && npm run post-build
scripts.build-client-prod: cd client && npm run build-prod npm run post-build
scripts.test: npm run test-server && nvm run test-client
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.build-docker: npm run build-prod && npm run server-docker
